title: Medieval Weapon Sound Effects
description: The Medieval Weapon Sound Effects Collection contains everything you need to add medieval weapon sound effects to a fantasy game or movie.  This pack contains 14 different weapon types and all together over 360  unique royalty free sound effects.
longDescription:
Any audio production that requires authentic medieval battle sounds should absolutely invest in the Medieval Weapon Sound Effects Collection because it is an indispensable tool. Because it contains such a wide variety of high-quality recordings of medieval weapons, having this collection is similar to having your very own medieval armory right at your disposal. This collection has everything you could possibly need for sound effects, including the impact of a bone-crushing hammer, the sound of a hero shooting an arrow, the destruction of a wall by a catapult, and more.


Any audio professional who is interested in giving their medieval-themed productions an air of realism and immersion should get their hands on the Medieval Weapon Sound Effects Collection as soon as possible. It is a complete library of sounds of the highest quality and authenticity, which will help you create your own soundscapes with less time and effort spent on the process. Consequently, if you want to take your audio production to new heights and arm yourself with the sounds of the Middle Ages, the Medieval Weapon Sound Effects Collection is exactly what you need.

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Arrow
  • Axe
  • Bow
  • Cannon
  • Catapult
  • Crossbow
  • Dagger
  • Mace
  • Musket
  • Shield
  • Sling
  • Spear
  • Sword



Number of Audio Waves: 360

Number of Audio Cues: 360

Sample rate / bit rate: WAV 96Khz 24bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 6 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: Single user license, royalty-free
